title: Digital Fiber Optical (Toslink) to Digital Coaxial (S/PDIF) Converter
description: This product is designed to be used to convert a fiber optic (Toslink) digital audio signal into a digital coaxial signal. If a receiver  amp only has digital coax inputs or all the optical inputs are full this device is the perfect solution to maintain digital audio throughout the system. This product supports all digital surround sound fields, such as: Dolby Digital 5.1, DTS, 7.1, etc.Warranty: Life Time for all products, including our entire premium line of cable showcase products. If our technical support team isnt able to find a solution for you, well be happy to exchange the item for a new one, even if multiple years have passed.
